item.title: Architecture
item.description: This page is an overview of open cluster management. Overview Open Cluster Management (OCM) is a powerful, modular, extensible platform for Kubernetes multi-cluster orchestration. Learning from the past failing lesson of building Kubernetes federation systems in the Kubernetes community, in OCM we will be jumping out of the legacy centric, imperative architecture of Kubefed v2 and embracing the “hub-agent” architecture which is identical to the original pattern of “hub-kubelet” from Kubernetes.
